verbose_text: ATPase activity in Trypanosoma cruzi epimastigote membranes is stimulated by addition of Na + ions and does not require the presence K + for activity, as do Na + / K + -ATPases, and this stimulation is ouabain-insensitive and furosemide sensitive [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ATPase activity in Trypanosoma cruzi epimastigote membranes is stimulated by addition of Na
